import React from 'react' import Bar from './' import { useState} from "react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import './dash.css' export default function Dashp({movie,setData,data,delta,sub}) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const hiddenFileInput = React.useRef(null); const handleClick = event => { hiddenFileInput.current.click(); }; const handleChange = (e) => { setData({ ...data, poster: e.target.files[0] }) }; return (
Modal heading

{movie.map((el) => (



{el.title}

8.5 | 1h 57min | Animation, Action, Adventure

WATCH NOW




))}
) }
